issue.title: Configuring gazebojs to connect to different masters

content.raw:
---


Would you like to connect to different gazebo masters at the same time? I think gazebojs can only connect to one master at a time. Alternatively, you can start multiple instances of your node app and each connects to a different master:

~~~
GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 node your_node_app.js
~~~

@hugomatic any inputs on this?
content.html:
Would you like to connect to different gazebo masters at the same time? I think gazebojs can only connect to one master at a time. Alternatively, you can start multiple instances of your node app and each connects to a different master:

GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 node your_node_app.js

@hugomatic any inputs on this?
